Name: M 36 - Ms. Maria Almonte-Weston, a Commissioner of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission
Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR MARIA ALMONTE-WESTON AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY LOCAL CONDITIONAL RELEASE COMMISSION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 9-207 of the New York City Administrative Code and Section 271 of the New York State Correction Law, the Council hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Maria Almonte-Weston as a member of the New York City Local Conditional Release Commission to serve a four-year term.
